target: You're very welcome. Have a lovely day.
context: <user> I'm trying to find a train that departs from London Kings Cross on Thursday. Can you help me book a ticket? <system> Sure, are you coming to Cambridge? What time would you like to depart? <user> Any time that lets me arrive by 08:45. <system> The TR4016 from london kings cross to cambridge, traveling on thursday, leaves at 07:17 and arrives at 8:08. Should I book it for you? <user> Yes can you please book that for 8 people and give me the reference number? <system> great, I was able to get your tickets. Reference number is FCRRA5HL and the tickets, 188.8 GBP are payable at the station, anything else? <user> Yes, have you heard of a restaurant called Curry King? <system> Yes, Curry King is an Indian restaurant in the centre. What more information would you like?<user> Can you book be there for 8 people at 18:30 on thursday? <system> I have your table reserved. The reference number is ZTVSJGBZ .<user> Thank you for reserving that for me. That's all I need today. <system>
